= Downloads =

Download the Sea Glass Look and Feel.

== Maven ==

If you are using Maven, you may include the following in your `pom.xml' file:

{{{
<repositories>
    <repository>
        <id>seaglass</id>
        <name>Sea Glass Look and Feel Repository</name>
        <url>http://seaglass.googlecode.com/svn/repo</url>
    </repository>
</repositories>
...
<dependencies>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.seaglass</groupId>
        <artifactId>seaglass</artifactId>
        <version>0.1</version>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>
}}}
